Title: Traefik Proxy deployment on Arc-enabled Kubernetes
Summary: This Jumpstart Drop demonstrates how to deploy and configure Traefik as an ingress controller in Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes clusters.
Description: This Jumpstart Drop provides Terraform and Kubernetes configurations for deploying Traefik as an ingress controller in Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes environments. This drop focuses on setting up Traefik as a reliable ingress controller in multi-cluster Arc kubernetes environments.
